content: included in the digital download is the crochet pattern for squirt the tiny turtle snuggler written in us terms this snuggler is perfect for little or big hands to love this crochet pattern works up quickly and is perfect for market makes the finished snuggler will measure approx 12 the pattern is for beginner to intermediate crocheters many pictures are included to help you through the project i d love to see how your squirt turns out don t forget to tag willow&wild with your finished photos @willow andwild
